name: MultiCatformer
description:
Building on a previous game jam game, City Catformer, my plan was to add multiplayer to it and some extra level height (to suit the TasJam theme ("Aspiration").

You play as a cat trying to reach the end of the level. But this time it's a race with friends!

Hosted on http://multicatformer.xyz

The game can be downloaded, also source on GitHub.

Source code: https://github.com/l33tllama/tasjam-multicatformer

Made with BablyonJS and NodeJS.

Credits:

Stripe the cat Blender model by Marchen - https://www.blendswap.com/blend/21698

Busy city Freesound by rucisko - https://freesound.org/people/rucisko/sounds/462494/

Cat screaming Freesound by InspectorJ - https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/415209/

Globe logo from pixabay https://pixabay.com/vectors/internet-icon-globe-design-online-1881759/

Ta-da sound   https://soundbible.com/1003-Ta-Da.html
